mapper.sql: id, parentid, categoryname, category_order, stat_jobs, stat_resume, spell, relation1, relation1_cn, relation2, relation2_cn
mapper.select: select q.*,j.money,j.brokerage from qs_category_jobs q LEFT JOIN job_category j on j.job_cate_id=q.id
mapper.insert:
